(0,): As a user, I want to upload a submission, so that I can submit data for processing As a broker, I want to process deletions for a given date, so that I can manage outdated or irrelevant data
(2,): As a broker, I want to add users, so that I can manage their submissions and access As a broker, I want to get a list of published FABS files, so that I can review and access successful submissions
(1,): As a broker, I want to prevent duplicate publishing of submissions, so that I can maintain data integrity and avoid errors As a validator, I want to validate DUNS records, so that I can ensure that submissions contain valid identifiers As a broker, I want to upload and validate files, so that I can systematically manage new data submissions
(3,): As a user, I want to publish a submission if it is validated, so that others can access the finalized data
(4,): As a validator, I want to validate required fields in a record, so that I can ensure all necessary information is provided for compliance
